org.jsfml.graphics

Class RenderTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
      • org.jsfml.graphics.RenderTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RenderTarget

    public class RenderTexture
extends SFMLNativeObject
implements RenderTarget
    Provides a render target for off-screen 2D rendering into a texture.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RenderTexture()
      Constructs a new render texture.

      • create

        public void create(int width,
          int height,
          boolean depthBuffer)
            throws TextureCreationException
        Sets up the render texture.
        Parameters:
        width - the texture's width.
        height - the texture's height.
        depthBuffer - true to generate a depth buffer, false otherwise. Use this only in case you wish to do 3D rendering to this texture.
        Throws:
        TextureCreationException - if the render texture could not be created.

      • create

        public final void create(int width,
          int height)
                  throws TextureCreationException
        Sets up the render texture without a depth buffer.
        Parameters:
        width - the texture's width.
        height - the texture's height.
        Throws:
        TextureCreationException - if the render texture could not be created.

      • setSmooth

        public void setSmooth(boolean smooth)
        Enables or disables textures smoothing.
        Parameters:
        smooth - true to enable, false to disable.

      • isSmooth

        public boolean isSmooth()
        Checks whether texture smoothing is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if enabled, false if not.

      • setRepeated

        public void setRepeated(boolean repeated)
        Enables or disables texture repeating for the underlying texture.

        Texture repeating is disabled by default.

        Parameters:
        repeated - true to enable, false to disable.

      • isRepeated

        public boolean isRepeated()
        Checks whether texture repeating is enabled for the underlying texture.
        Returns:
        true if enabled, false if disabled.

      • setActive

        public void setActive(boolean active)
        Activates or deactivates the render texture for rendering.
        Parameters:
        active - true to activate, false to deactivate.
